tasks.question: Identify the title of each event
tasks.guidance: The playbills often contain details of multiple events that occurring on the same date, a rectangle should be drawn around the titles of each of htese. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.

actors.description: Identify actors and roles in historic playbills

tasks.question: Identify each actor and role
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around each actor (with the same rectangle encapsulating the associated role, if present).
